review_data.title: High quality, high price
review_data.content: + Great food - Super expensive - Small portions (was still hungry after one main course, they expect you to take the expensive menu or go for starter, main course and dessert otherwise you'd be starving) => Low value for money

review_data.title: The Thai in Zurich
